tool_description: The bank statement API helps banks and lenders make decisions b providing outputs about Salary frequency and estimation, current financial health of the individual, any risky behaviour associated with the transactions.
title: Indian Bank Statement

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Indian Bank Statement
api_list.description: The bank statement API helps banks and lenders make decisions b providing outputs about Salary frequency and estimation, current financial health of the individual, any risky behaviour associated with the transactions. Use the get call to fetch the result of the request_id received in response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-bank-statement.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_bank_statement"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-bank-statement.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-bank-statement.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_bank_statement"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
